General.Name: Baoding Dongli Machinery Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Baoding Dongli Machinery Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies automobile parts China. Its product portfolio includes automotive engine parts, oil pipeline parts, wheel hubs, belt pulleys, inertia wheels, flywheel rings, brackets, shock absorbers for automobile engines, gray and ductile cast iron parts, ordinary and alloy steel parts, stainless steel parts, copper parts, aluminum parts, etc. The company exports its products the United States, European countries, and Japan. Baoding Dongli Machinery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Baoding, China.
General.Address: No 29 Qianjin East Street, Baoding, China, 071000
